article_title: Inmate Found Dead In Lawton Prison - News9.com - Oklahoma City, OK - News, Weather, Video and Sports
article_text:
A GEO Prison inmate was found dead on the floor of his cell Monday morning.

Lawton police say 33-year-old Christopher Glass was found in his cell just before 7:30 a.m. He was taken to the prison infirmary and transported to SWMC where he was pronounced dead shortly after 9 a.m.
